[SYNTAX]: Awkward phrasing in descriptive passages (e.g., prolonged, elaborate sentences about violin handling).
[LEXICON]: Inconsistent formatting (e.g., italicized corrections in dialogue).

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt, unconnected shifts between historical references (Reynolds, Bahá’u’lláh), descriptive scenes, and biographical backstory.
[TRANSITION]: Lack of logical flow between paragraphs (e.g., violin scene to Royal Academy commentary).

[SYNTAX]: Minor awkward phrasing in "When he was well seated" (lacks transitional clarity).
[LEXICON]: Uncommon terms ("congress" shoe, contextually unclear without explanation).

[STRUCTURE]: Slight abruptness transitioning from philosophical questions to practical self-education examples.
[CLARITY]: Extended question list momentarily disrupts narrative flow.
